cn.title: 警惕恶意授权骗局的公告

message.data: 亲爱的派友：
经用户反馈，近期市场中骗取授权的盗币事件频发。
风险项目方 https://eth-bit.com/、http://cat-eth.biz、http://eth-cat.com、https://eth-cat.co、https://eth-ant.com/以高额收益吸引用户参与，在用户参与该项目时，骗取用户授权，而后盗取转移用户地址上的资产。
为了避免此类骗局造成您的资产损失，您需谨记：
1、不要向任何陌生项目合约地址授权；
2、请勿参与任何陌生人主动推荐的高收益项目；
3、Telegram 中诈骗项目居多，请勿轻信他人；
4、如不小心向风险项目授权，请及时转移资产并不要再用此地址进行收款。
请认准比特派官网：1.bitpie.com 2.bitpiehk.com 3.bitpie.one 4.bitpiecn.com  5.bitpieasia.com
如有问题请联系比特派官方工作人员：service@bitpie.com
感谢您对比特派 Bitpie 的支持。

en.title: Beware of the announcement of malicious authorization

message.data: Rencenly, there are frequent cases of fraudulently obtaining users’ authorization. Some risky project parties like https://eth-bit.com/、http://cat-eth.biz、http://eth-cat.com、https://eth-cat.co、https://eth-ant.com/ attract users to participate in a high profit project, to get their authorization and steal the assets from their wallet.
In order to avoid such scams, please
1. Do not authorize any unfamiliar project contract address;
2. Do not participate in any high-yield projects recommended by strangers;
3. Most of the fraud projects in Telegram, do not trust any strangers;
4. If you accidentally authorize an unfamiliar project, please transfer the assets immediately and do not use this address for storing assets.
Here are the official website of Bitpie:
1.bitpie.com 2.bitpiehk.com 3.bitpie.one 4.bitpiecn.com  5.bitpieasia.com
If you have any questions, please contact Bitpie official email: service@bitpie.com
Thank you for your support to Bitpie.
Bitpie team

Bitpie team
2021/08/18
